com.querydsl.lucene4

Class LuceneQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.querydsl.lucene4.AbstractLuceneQuery<org.apache.lucene.document.Document,LuceneQuery>
      • com.querydsl.lucene4.LuceneQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Fetchable<org.apache.lucene.document.Document>, FilteredClause<LuceneQuery>, SimpleQuery<LuceneQuery>

    public class LuceneQuery
extends AbstractLuceneQuery<org.apache.lucene.document.Document,LuceneQuery>
    LuceneQuery is a Querydsl query implementation for Lucene queries.

    Example:

    QDocument doc = new QDocument("doc");

 IndexSearcher searcher = new IndexSearcher(index);
 LuceneQuery query = new LuceneQuery(true, searcher);
 List<Document> documents = query
     .where(doc.year.between("1800", "2000").and(doc.title.startsWith("Huckle"))
     .fetch();
    Author:
    vema
